events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund issue based on their message about returning the jacket and wanting their money back.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and has never been worn or tampered with. I just found it doesn't fit well.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process for you. Please use the prepaid return label we will email shortly to send the jacket back.
I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label. I will return the jacket right away and expect the refund soon.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the credited amount in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not heard back from you regarding any further issues, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting us.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
